activities: RocketLife offers online book making and gift making software that allows end customers to create items that are produced and shipped to the end customers homes. Payment methods include credit card numbers which are only held long enough for a reservation and then reference number along with personal shipping addresses.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer Name, address, purchase amount and payment methods all automated.
recoursemech: To contact RocketLife about website privacy issues, to report a violation of the Privacy Policy, or to raise any other issue, send email to: privacy@RocketLife.com. All privacy policy issues are investigated by RocketLife until resolved or closed.  The company will use the American Arbitration Association for dispute mediation.
